Text.Page:
You there! You've got the look of a seasoned veteran. Have you ever faced off against one of the federation's finest? It's an experience not to be missed.

If the thought intrigues you, seek out Erigar in the Agora. He'll sort you out.

Another bloodthirsty newcomer, eh?

Right. Here's how it works. I sell you seeds of rebellion, which you can use to temporarily bypass Velik's blessing against infighting. Believe me, if you've ever heard of the Night of Arrows, you'll be all-too-eager to avoid angering Velik. Sometimes it takes a few seeds to bypass the blessing, sometimes just one.

What do you say? Ready to get a little bloody?
